summary: This document is a series of suicide watch observation logs for inmate Jeffrey Edward Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, covering the period from July 6, 2019, to July 24, 2019. The logs record routine observations of Epstein's behavior and condition while on suicide watch, ending just before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the suicide watch logs, being observed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

events.title: Epstein placed on suicide watch
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein is placed on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

events.title: Suicide watch ended
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's suicide watch status is stopped at 0845 hours.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was on formal suicide watch from at least July 6, 2019, to July 24, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).
The suicide watch log ended on July 24, 2019, at 0845 hours, which was the day Epstein was found dead in his cell.
The logs show routine, periodic observations of Epstein's behavior and condition, but the specific handwritten observations are largely illegible in this document.
The document is part of the official Bureau of Prisons record-keeping for inmates on suicide prevention protocols.
